parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Math

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Multiplies graph values by the given coefficient. The corresponding lower bound value is used instead if the product is smaller than the bound.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[decayGraphValues]] [lowerBoundValues, graphValues, coef]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>[lowerBoundValues, graphValues, coef]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>lowerBoundValues: [[Array]] - Lower bound for the new graph

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>graphValues: [[Array]] - Graph values

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value>coef: [[Number]] - The coefficient to be multiplied with

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[decayGraphValues]] &#91;[1,2,3,4,5], [1,4,9,16,25], 0.3] //returns [1,2,3,4.8,7.5]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getGraphValues]]
</value></part></template>
